${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Bosco.NAME: APD-B317 “Bosco”
${modID}:Bosco.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x 2 damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:PickaxeSwing.NAME: Pickaxe Swing
${modID}:PickaxeSwing.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals.

${modID}:Shockwave.NAME: Shockwave
${modID}:Shockwave.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. Deal !D! damage to all enemies.  NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals per enemy hit.

${modID}:PowerAttack.NAME: Power Attack
${modID}:PowerAttack.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals.

${modID}:WarthogAuto210.NAME: “Warthog“ Auto 210
${modID}:WarthogAuto210.DESCRIPTION: Use 5 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

${modID}:ThunderheadHeavyAutocannon.NAME: “Thunderhead” H.A.
${modID}:ThunderheadHeavyAutocannon.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard up to !M! cards. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each card discarded.

${modID}:HurricaneGuidedRocketSystem.NAME: “Hurricane” G.R.S.
${modID}:HurricaneGuidedRocketSystem.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !M! ${modID}:Burn to a random enemy 4 times.

${modID}:Drak25PlasmaCarbine.NAME: Drak-25 P.C.
${modID}:Drak25PlasmaCarbine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Shock. NL Draw a card for every 2 debuffs the enemy has.

${modID}:PlatformGun.NAME: Platform Gun
${modID}:PlatformGun.DESCRIPTION: Use 5 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block next turn.

${modID}:ZiplineLauncher.NAME: Zipline Launcher
${modID}:ZiplineLauncher.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:ReinforcedPowerDrills.NAME: R. Power Drills
${modID}:ReinforcedPowerDrills.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:mine! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burn to all enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

${modID}:GrapplingHook.NAME: Grappling Hook
${modID}:GrapplingHook.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL Draw 1 card for each enemy. {!Upgrades!|1=NL Gain !B! Block.} NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BarbedDrills.NAME: Barbed Drills
${modID}:BarbedDrills.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage !${modID}:NumAttacks! times. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals.

${modID}:OverchargedPickaxe.NAME: Overcharged Pickaxe
${modID}:OverchargedPickaxe.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Shock to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BetterWeightBalance.NAME: Better Weight Balance
${modID}:BetterWeightBalance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Double current ${modID}:Minerals. {!Upgrades!|0=NL Exhaust.}

${modID}:DizzySwing.NAME: Dizzy Swing
${modID}:DizzySwing.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage for each level of ${modID}:Intoxication you have.

${modID}:JuryRiggedShotgun.NAME: Jury Rigged Boomstick
${modID}:JuryRiggedShotgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! cards and draw !M! cards.

${modID}:ZhukovNUK17.NAME: Zhukov NUK17
${modID}:ZhukovNUK17.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x 2 damage. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Shock and ${modID}:Freeze.

${modID}:NBoltsharkX80.NAME: N. Boltshark X-80
${modID}:NBoltsharkX80.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !M! damage for each card in your hand. {!Location!|0=NL (Deals !D! damage).}

${modID}:BreachCutter.NAME: Breach Cutter
${modID}:BreachCutter.DESCRIPTION: Use !M! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, apply ${modID}:Burn to all enemies equal to half of the target's max HP.

${modID}:ShardDiffractor.NAME: Shard Diffractor
${modID}:ShardDiffractor.DESCRIPTION: {@@} Deal damage equal to the current Mineral count. {!Location!|0=NL (Deals !D! damage).} NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BulldogHeavyRevolver.NAME: “Bulldog” H. Revolver
${modID}:BulldogHeavyRevolver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard up to 2 cards and deal !D! damage for each.

${modID}:BRT7BurstFireGun.NAME: BRT7 Burst Fire Gun
${modID}:BRT7BurstFireGun.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL The next !M! Attack{!Upgrades!|1=s} you play cost 0.

${modID}:ArmskoreCoilGun.NAME: Armskore Coil Gun
${modID}:ArmskoreCoilGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, transfer the enemy's debuffs to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Subata120.NAME: Subata 120
${modID}:Subata120.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has ${modID}:Freeze, ${modID}:Shock, or ${modID}:Burn, gain [E] {!Upgrades!|1=[E] }. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ColetteWaveCooler.NAME: Colette Wave Cooker
${modID}:ColetteWaveCooler.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal damage equal to {!Upgrades!|1=DOUBLE }the enemy's total debuffs. {!Location!|0=NL (Deals !D! damage).} NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ExperimentalPlasmaCharger.NAME: E. Plasma Charger
${modID}:ExperimentalPlasmaCharger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals.

${modID}:Drilldozer.NAME: Drilldozer “Doretta”
${modID}:Drilldozer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|1=Innate. NL} Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Add a card from your deck to your hand. It costs [E] less this turn.

${modID}:FoxArmorRig.NAME: “Fox” Armor Rig
${modID}:FoxArmorRig.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! ${modID}:Shock back.

${modID}:MoleArmorRig.NAME: “Mole” Armor Rig
${modID}:MoleArmorRig.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain 10 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Gain !B! Block for every 10 ${modID}:Minerals you have. {!Location!|0=NL (Gain !${modID}:blockGain! Block).}

${modID}:OwlArmorRig.NAME: “Owl” Armor Rig
${modID}:OwlArmorRig.DESCRIPTION: Use 10 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the cost of a card in your hand by 1.

${modID}:BarracudaArmorRig.NAME: “Barracuda” Armor Rig
${modID}:BarracudaArmorRig.DESCRIPTION: Use 20 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:SkullCrusherAle.NAME: Skull Crusher Ale
${modID}:SkullCrusherAle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Intoxication. NL All Attacks cost 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SlayerStout.NAME: Slayer Stout
${modID}:SlayerStout.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Intoxication. NL Add !M! card{!Upgrades!|1=s} from your deck to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PotsOGold.NAME: Pots O' Gold
${modID}:PotsOGold.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Intoxication. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals when you play a card this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RedRockBlaster.NAME: Red Rock Blaster
${modID}:RedRockBlaster.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Intoxication. NL When you would lose HP this turn, lose 1 less. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DarkMorkite.NAME: Dark Morkite
${modID}:DarkMorkite.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Intoxication. NL Gain double ${modID}:Minerals for !M! turn{!Upgrades!|1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GoldVein.NAME: Gold Vein
${modID}:GoldVein.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Draw 1 card for every 15 ${modID}:Minerals you have. {!Location!|0=NL (Draw !${modID}:cardDraw! cards).}

${modID}:BornReady.NAME: Born Ready
${modID}:BornReady.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each card in your discard pile.

${modID}:DeepPockets.NAME: Deep Pockets
${modID}:DeepPockets.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals at the start of your turn.

${modID}:SecondWind.NAME: Second Wind
${modID}:SecondWind.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with ${modID}:Intoxication, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ElementalInsulation.NAME: Elemental Insulation
${modID}:ElementalInsulation.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked, apply !M! ${modID}:Burn, ${modID}:Freeze, and ${modID}:Shock to the attacker.

${modID}:Vampire.NAME: Vampire
${modID}:Vampire.DESCRIPTION: On a Fatal Pickaxe Attack, heal !M!.

${modID}:SupercoolingChamber.NAME: Supercooling Chamber
${modID}:SupercoolingChamber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, increase this card's damage by !M! and return this card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BulletHell.NAME: Bullet Hell
${modID}:BulletHell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard your hand. Deal !D! damage twice for each card discarded. NL {!Location!|0=(Deals !D! damage !M! times).}

${modID}:Snowball.NAME: Snowball
${modID}:Snowball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${modID}:Freeze to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Executioner.NAME: Executioner
${modID}:Executioner.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal double damage against Elites and Bosses.

${modID}:BloodyCoolDrills.NAME: Bloody Cold Drills
${modID}:BloodyCoolDrills.DESCRIPTION: Pickaxe. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL ${modID}:Freeze affects this card 2 times.

${modID}:BlackoutStout.NAME: Blackout Stout
${modID}:BlackoutStout.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Set ${modID}:Intoxication to 5. {!Upgrades!|1=NL Draw !M! cards.} NL ${modID}:Intoxication will not decrease. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CoreInfusion.NAME: Core Infusion
${modID}:CoreInfusion.DESCRIPTION: Spend 20 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Randomly apply !M! ${modID}:Burn, ${modID}:Shock, ${modID}:Freeze randomly to all enemies.

${modID}:AbyssBar.NAME: Abyss Bar
${modID}:AbyssBar.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random ${modID}:Intoxication cards to your hand. They cost 0 and Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LMG.NAME: LMG Gun Platform
${modID}:LMG.DESCRIPTION: When you gain ${modID}:Minerals, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:ShieldLink.NAME: Shield Link
${modID}:ShieldLink.DESCRIPTION: For up to !M! damage, when you receive damage, lose ${modID}:Minerals equal to the amount instead.

${modID}:DrunkForm.NAME: Drunk Form
${modID}:DrunkForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Intoxication. NL No longer affected by negative ${modID}:Intoxication effects except level V.

${modID}:SeeYou.NAME: See You In Hell
${modID}:SeeYou.DESCRIPTION: When attacking an enemy, deal !M! extra damage for each debuff they have.

${modID}:WeRich.NAME: We're Rich!
${modID}:WeRich.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, spend half of current ${modID}:Mineral count and gain Gold equal to that amount. {!Upgrades!|1= NL Gain [E] when drawn.}

${modID}:IronWill.NAME: Iron Will
${modID}:IronWill.DESCRIPTION: For each Attack you play in a row, gain !M! Block and increase that value by !M!. Resets on non-Attack played.

${modID}:SatchelCharge.NAME: Satchel Charge
${modID}:SatchelCharge.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BETC.NAME: BET-C
${modID}:BETC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:FatBoy.NAME: Fat Boy
${modID}:FatBoy.DESCRIPTION: Spend 40 ${modID}:Minerals. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Burn to ALL enemies.

${modID}:LaserPointer.NAME: Laser Pointer
${modID}:LaserPointer.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. Otherwise, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Belch.NAME: Belch
${modID}:Belch.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses Strength to ${modID}:Intoxication. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DeepDive.NAME: Deep Dive
${modID}:DeepDive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Minerals. NL Increase ${modID}:Mineral gain by 10.
